about_the_game:
Alone Jumper is a game that combines multiple genres, where you will face a challenging journey to the top. Climb to the top of the city-tower Soliturris, save your beloved daughter and thwart the plans of the Corporates. Unusual story, unique gameplay for each zone, various mini-games and of course, jumping.

Will Bufo "Jumper" be able to get back the most precious things in life? Or will he be alone forever?


Story and gameplay:

We want to make a unique gameplay experience in Alone Jumper that will keep you from getting bored throughout the entire playthrough.

The city-tower of Soliturris was built after the World Collapse, an incident that wiped out four continents. The surviving Population found themselves on an island with the ruins of the Old World floating around them. Reptiles, Birds, Snakes and Mammals had to get along together. So they decided to build an unusual city-tower, Soliturris, which would be divided into different Zones.

Each Zone will have a different gameplay and story:
  • Junkyard - hardcore platformer, 2D;
  • Technopunks - platformer, 2D;
  • Reptoheaven - interactive movie, first-person view;
  • Kawaii Paradise - rhythm game, 2D;
  • Lost City - visual novel, action, first-person view;
  • Glitch Tower - walking (and jumping) simulator, 2.5D;
  • Corporate Elite - hardcore platformer, 2D.

Key features:
  • psychological drama genre story;
  • switchable mechanical arm to complete different Zones;
  • unique characters that will help the protagonist;
  • changing cameras and perspectives;
  • cutscenes;
  • jumps, jumps, lots of jumps.

Stay tuned for updates and don't forget.... Are you alone?

name: Alone Jumper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GhZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
